files = []
def mock_open(filename, flag, *args, **kwargs):
    assert flag in ('w+', 'w+b', 'a')
    file = MockFile()
    file.filename = filename
    files.append(file)
    return file
monkeypatch.setattr(builtins, 'open', mock_open)
return files
pytest.fixture(name='mock_files', autouse=True)
